::Hevn::
   
  The Hevn puppet, under Jhiaxus' command, was waiting for Nightlight when she left the base. He figures that she was going after Rodimus. He opens a channel.
   
  Hevn: Nightlight, it's not safe. Return!

Airshadow <airly2002@...> wrote:
            Nighlight:
   
   
  Nightlight couldnt wait more, Salveo hadnt told her an answer, so she would find out what happened with her husband. She ran towards the closest exit and left the base the base she flew towards Hot rod's position.
   
  OOC: Tag Robo. 
   
   
   
    ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Richard Allen 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Thursday, December 06, 2007 10:26 PM
  Subject: A Fallen Legend
  

      ::Kup/Lord Elder::
   
  The boat runs a shore on the island as Kup and Elder off load. They run to Hot Rod's side, kneeling.
   
  Kup: C'mon, lad. Give us a sign here...
   
  Elder is awaiting a reply from Lord Perseus.
    
---------------------------------
  Be a better friend, newshound, and know-it-all with Yahoo! Mobile. Try it now.   

  

                         

       
---------------------------------
Never miss a thing.   Make Yahoo your homepage.
